mapper.sql: warehousing_no, sku, box_seq, total_num, wrap_type, `name`, received
mapper.insert: insert into l_warehousing_content (warehousing_no, sku, box_seq, total_num, wrap_type, `name`, received,actual) values (#{warehousingNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{boxSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wrapType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{received},#{actual})

insert into l_warehousing_content (warehousing_no, sku, box_seq, total_num, wrap_type, `name`, received,actual,uuid) values
(#{item.warehousingNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.boxSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.totalNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.wrapType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.received},#{item.actual},#{item.uuid})

insert into l_warehousing_content
warehousing_no,
sku,
box_seq,
total_num,
wrap_type,
`name`,
received,
actual,
#{warehousingNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{boxSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{totalNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{wrapType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{received},
#{actual},
mapper.select: select warehousing_no as warehousingNo, sku, box_seq as boxSeq, total_num as totalNum, wrap_type as wrapType, `name` as name, received actual from l_warehousing_content where warehousing_no = #{warehousingNo}
